title: Divisional Round preview & head coaching news
itunes:title: Divisional Round preview & head coaching news
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, and Marc Sessler – welcome in NFL Media’s Andrew Siciliano to discuss the latest news from around the NFL, including the league voting to allow the St. Louis Rams to move the franchise to Los Angeles, and the 49ers naming Chip Kelly as their new head coach. Then, the heroes go game-by-game breaking down each divisional round matchup as the second round of the playoffs begins Saturday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
